name: DREAMGAME 3.0
description:
DREAMGAME is a experimental horror game, lightly inspired by Yai Gameworks and their amazing collection of horror games. DREAMGAME is a game about finding uhhhh... DREAMGAME, to find DREAMGAME you must search the surreal hell that used to be a something else uhhh.

What is DREAMGAME?

Ị̘̼̻͍̮ ̮g͍̕u͍̤͍e͠ś̙̥̮s̺̲̻͡ ̴̹̝̘ẁ̱̻̝͎e̠̗̯̖̣̬'̞̹̘͍͍ll̢̝̳̟̖̜̗̣ ̙͉͙͎͈̞͍n̞̗̞̪̤͖̤e҉ve̯ͅr̤̹̤̫̟͔ ̬̝̳̫̥͞k̞̬̹no̤͖̱͡w̮̖͎͓̱̦͢
